pr_title: DROOLS-5714 DMN produce programmatically OAS first iteration

timeline.message: support for type name containing spaces
collection support and anonymous innner type collection of base type

timeline.author: danielezonca

replies.bodyText: yes well spotted, I missed that as I refactored.
replies.author: tarilabs

timeline.bodyText: As far as I can see only ioSets is actually used. What about a TODO/remove the unused fields?
timeline.author: danielezonca

replies.bodyText:
Here you missed also jsonSchemaNode and namingPolicy are actually used.
So this comment is not valid.
But we can always refactor in future iterations 👍
replies.author: tarilabs

timeline.bodyText: What about convert ioSets as Map<DMNModel, DMNModelIOSets>  directly in the constructor (or Map<DMNModel, List<DMNModelIOSets>> if you want to preserve the possibility to have multiple DMNModelIOSets for each DMNModel)?
timeline.author: danielezonca

replies.bodyText: currently I will have only 1 DMNModelIOSets per DMN model, so I guess is fine as-is.
replies.author: tarilabs

timeline.bodyText: I like this idea to create an aggregated type to represent the whole input/output 👍
timeline.author: danielezonca
danielezonca

timeline.bodyText: Considering that typesIndex is immutable why don't populate a Map<DMNType, Schema> map in the constructor to be returned here?
timeline.author: danielezonca

replies.bodyText:
order of operation/phase matters here.
I cannot do it in the constructor since the naming policy is required first,
and naming policy is part of the overall "build" operation.
Will leave as-is.
replies.author: tarilabs
